title: Iran update plus a deep dive in Senate races: Courtney Kube, Brad Todd & JB Poersch
description: NBC News' Courtney Kube gives the latest Iran update. Later, Republican ad-maker Brad Todd and Democratic strategist JB Poersch discuss how impeachment will affect the 2020 Senate map.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
